mapper.update: update tb_seckill_voucher set stock = stock-1 where voucher_id = #{id} and stock > 0
mapper.select: select v.id, v.shop_id, v.title, v.sub_title, v.rules, v.pay_value, v.actual_value, v.type, v.status, v.create_time, v.update_time, s.stock, s.begin_time, s.end_time from tb_voucher as v ,tb_seckill_voucher as s where v.id = #{id} and v.id = s.voucher_id
